original: OLSSON, Emil Folke, Fabrikör, Kumla, f Kumla 9/5 99 av Erik Olsson o Maria Nilsson, gm Edla Gullie. Folksk, fackkurser. Start tills m fabr Otto R fma Olsson & Rosén sko-fabr 23. Led pens.nmdn mfl kommun uppdr. Resor: Tyskl, Österr, Ung mfl länd. TR. Hobby: Friluftsliv.
translated: OLSSON, Emil Folke, Manufacturer, Kumla, b. Kumla May 9th, 1899, to Erik Olsson and Maria Nilsson, m. Edla Gullie. Elementary school education, vocational training. Started working at his father's company, Olsson & Rosén shoemaking factory, in 1923. Served as a member of the pension committee and other municipal duties. Traveled to Germany, Austria, Hungary, and other countries. Treasurer. Hobby: Outdoor activities.
